Articles.Content:
is there a mod that adds stuff like more solar panels, station parts, and probe parts?

i have an OKS station but i think itd look better with larger and different looking solar panels.

i want to launch probes that look like they were designed by NASA.

and lastly, i want to land a lander that looks like an apollo lander of sorts.

do any mods add all of this?

thanks ahead.

Solar panels: Near Future Electrical

Station parts: fuztek station parts (good for sandbox); station science (good for career/science modes); google it, lots to be found

Probe parts: AIES is probably your best bet - bunch of new probe parts, plus some rockets

FASA for all of your NASA pre Space Shuttle Needs, This pack for US probes http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/93389-0-25-US-Probes-Pack-Old-and-New-v0-26-Release-10-19-14, there is KOSMOS which is getting updated, Fustek for station parts, I mean there is a lot out there you just have to look.

Probe parts: AIES is probably your best bet - bunch of new probe parts, plus some rockets

Problem with AIES is that its outdated. Whenever I tried using it nevertheless my game stopped loading midway.

Problem with AIES is that its outdated. Whenever I tried using it nevertheless my game stopped loading midway.

Never had a problem with AIES but yes it is alittle out of date but it all works and, I still use the pack there was alittle problem with the legs but, I have posted a patch for them.

Never had a problem with AIES but yes it is alittle out of date but it all works and, I still use the pack there was alittle problem with the legs but, I have posted a patch for them.

Well seems like I didn't read the installation guide properly >.< Could you by any chance send me the link to that patch?

For the legs ? have it in FS plugin or stock ModuleAnimateGeneric there both here with Anntenna patches for 2 mods http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/35383-0-23-AIES-Aerospace-v1-5-1?p=1425987&viewfull=1#post1425987

EDIT- And have a 3 patch but for that 1 you need Foundations plugin and with it adds a button to the leg that will make you stay in place even if on a slope if you want this 1 PM me.

Edited November 8, 2014 by Mecripp2
